buttons.closePairSelectorTooltip: Click to close the exchange settings

profile.profileSettingsButtonToolTip: Open the exchange settings for this strategy.

pairExchangeSettings.currentPairTooltip: Select and setup currencies and symbols

resetConfigs.warning: You are about to reset all selected settings. Do you want to continue?

exchangeSelector.exchangeNotAuthenticatedTooltip: Failed to verify your API keys. Valid API keys are required for real trading.
exchangeSelector.isTestedExchangeTooltip: This exchange is fully supported and tested.
exchangeSelector.isTestedExchangeSimulatedTooltip: This exchange is tested and supported in simulation mode only.
exchangeSelector.isUntestedExchangeTooltip: This exchange has not been tested yet and is not officially supported.
exchangeSelector.hasWebsocketTooltip: This exchange supports websocket and can support a lot of pairs.
exchangeSelector.noWebsocketTooltip: This exchange does not support websocket and can only use a limited amount of pairs.

apps.cantSelectStrategyModeTooltip: You cant change the mode on a read only strategy. Clone a strategy to customize all settings.

optimizer.deletes-the-selected-runs-from-the-queue: Deletes the selected runs from the queue
optimizer.queue-this-will-delete-all-runs-in-this-: This will delete all runs in this optimizer id
optimizer.queue-this-will-randomize-all-records-in: This will randomize all records in this optimizer id

runDataTable.no-backtests-finished-yet-message: No backtests finished yet. Once a backtest is finished, you can select them here to analyze the results.
runDataTable.no-settings-found-for-this-run: No settings found for this run
runDataTable.restores-all-settings-from-this-run: Restores all settings from this run
runDataTable.select-only-one-run-to-be-able-to-restor: Select only one run to be able to restore the settings
runDataTable.load-plots-for-selected-runs-or-just-sel: Load plots for selected runs or just select them. Helpful when you want to select runs to delete.
runDataTable.toggle-displaying-data-only-from-the-cur: Toggle displaying data only from the current campaign or from all activated ones

notSupportedOctoBotDistroWarning.octobotproject-is-not-officially-support: {{octobotProject}} is not officially supported yet by {projectName}

failed-to-activate-real-time-strategy: Failed to activate real time strategy

plot-settings.plot-unrealized-portfolio-amount-for-eac: Plot unrealized portfolio amount for each asset

timeFrameSelector.the-newly-selected-time-frames-will-be-a: The newly selected time frames will be available after a restart
